title: Fantasy of feet
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Warren Brown and Frederic Goodich
brief_description: Shows scenes of feet walking, dancing, running, and jumping, barefooted and in sandals, flippers, slippers and boots to encourage children to think about the different kinds of shoes and how feet serve their many functions. Suitable for upper primary level.
